EmailTemplate.name: Fina Instructions before classroom - Augusta
EmailTemplate.subject: Sales Training using Salesforce.com - instructions before classroom session
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
The ready access to Account, Opportunity and Lead information that is enabled by Salesforce.com will help us improve customer relationships, reduce manual tasks and more easily access information while on the go. I am excited to work with you as you learn how to use this tool to grow sales in your territory. The purpose of this note is to provide guidance coming into our Classroom Training session next week.
(1) How should I prepare for the meetings?Complete the e-Learning courses outlined in your Training Roadmap (hint: there are only 2 - "Salesforce.com Fundamentals" and "Sales Representative Fundamentals")Mark Complete, and Save your Task to "Please Review User Profile"Watch the Learning Transition video (3 minutes) to better understand the next steps in your training. Click this link (or paste it into your browser window) and select Learning Transition Video - http://hslearning.intra.sears.com/HSL/Training/Salesforce-Training.aspx
(2) What do I need to bring? What should I wear?Your Sears photo ID badge, if you have one. (Note: visitor badges will be provided)Laptop and chargerDriver's license or other photo IDDress code - http://inside.intra.sears.com/Inside2000/hoffman/dresscode.html
(3) What is the agenda?Your classroom training session will build on the skills you learned through e-Learning and use case studies and role plays to help you understand how Salesforce will support your role as Account Manager. Here are the times:Arrive at Sears Commercial Order Management Center (2417 Regency Blvd, Unit 6 - Augusta, GA 30904) prior to 8am ET on the morning of your training session. Class will run from 8am to 5pm with a group lunch, a short break in the morning and one in the afternoon.
Finally, you will soon receive a new Task Request from me in Salesforce. Your data, including Accounts and Opportunities has been loaded and is ready for use. There are a few places where you may need to edit your data. We have created special instructions and special Views within Salesforce to make this easy on you. Please plan to spend about an hour over the next week reviewing and updating your Account and Opportunity data. When you are ready to begin, please click this link (or paste it into your browser) then click download in the lower left corner of the window that pops-up - https://na1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/30000000lp1barARGbSaqymDgxXeMFeDbnoUNSw=
I look forward to seeing you next week. Best, {!User.FirstName}
Sears Commercial has partnered with Salesforce.com to bring the world’s leading sales enablement technology to its Account Managers. Go to http://login.salesforce.com to begin seeing the positive impact in sales revenues which has been achieved by Salesforce.com customers across its base of over 77,500 companies and over 2,000,000 sales users.
